entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Uri seems to incorrectly escape local paths containing certain Unicode characters #89538
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expressions size regression #89527
  • Can the System.Data.Odbc driver support async IO? #89526
  • .Net 6.0 Windows service crashing on system shutdown or reboot #89515
    Future
  • CollectionMarshaller code fixer provides implementation with Span<nint> for GetManagedValuesDestination and -Source #89514
    9.0.0
  • MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAnyExcept produces invalid results in AVX-512 enabled hardware #89512
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Error in mono_download_assets: TypeError: pendingDownloadInternal is null #89510
    8.0.0
  • Compiling mono for android on windows fails #89496
  • JIT: GDV does not handle delegates pointing to generic methods correctly #89495
    8.0.0
  • EventHandler remove operation performance issue #89494
  • [mono] Apple mobile tests could not find test artifacts #89491
    8.0.0

Closed

  • chrome-DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests crashing in CI #89470
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions work planned for .NET 8 #77390
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Recommend string.StartsWith(c) instead of string.StartsWith("c") #78392
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] string.ToLower() == otherString.ToLower() #78607
    8.0.0
  • TraceSwitch can have inconsistent internal state #83153
    8.0.0
  • SIGSEGV at `MethodTable::GetFlag` #81153
    Future
  • Problem with debugging WASM #82777
    8.0.0
  • [maui] Airplane Mode causes app to crash with no message #83615
    8.0.0
  • Unable to debug Blazor from Vscode #85599
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM in VS2022 not work with 7.0.8 #88204
    8.0.0
  • Use wasm and js integration for unsupported systems #89500
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Assertion sgen-gc.c:1251, condition `sgen_gray_object_queue_is_empty (queue)' not met #88757
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] Check if we can still skip GC critical method check in WASM #75970
    8.0.0
  • `AssemblyName.CodeBase` stripped from `AssemblyName` before going to Resolving event handler #59669
    Future
  • COMPlus_PartialNGen is not being set since repo consolidation #32935
    8.0.0
  • Add MacOS M1 (ARM64) to runtime-extra-platforms leg #64929
    8.0.0
  • [armel/tizen] Broken build #73571
    8.0.0
  • dotnet runtime pack command finished leaving running dotnet.exe #74133
    8.0.0
  • Add test to confirm the general purpose bit flag is unset when no encoding is specified in ZipArchive #87882
    8.0.0
  • [WASM] 4GB address space #58382
    8.0.0
  • BinaryData + JSON source gen produces compiler warnings #81702
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure in sgen-mono.c while running System.Drawing tests #44165
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] report undisposed proxies of JSObject, ManagedObject #70660
    8.0.0
  • Optimize subsequential Blazor WASM load #66982
    8.0.0
  • [TestFailure] GetAsync_SetAutomaticDecompression_ContentDecompressed_Deflate (Gateway Timeout) #87864
    Future
  • PGO: simple generic method is not inlined #88299
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Stepping out of an async method doesn't return to the call site #42421
    9.0.0
  • Warning when using a collection initializer with more elements than specified in the capacity #89461
  • [Mono] Single stepping can cause runtime and debugger-libs to disagree on suspend count. #89391
    8.0.0
  • .net8 prev 5 unassociated AOT processes crash when the debugger starts on the system. #87739
    8.0.0
  • simpleruntimeeventvalidation test failing in CI #88499
  • Remove EventPipe adapter from NativeAOT implementation #88262
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT EventPipe require multi byte to wide char support #88785
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` *AOT* timing out, even though the tests ran to completion #85676
    8.0.0
  • Consider preserving some types for DiagnosticSource to work with dotnet-monitor in NativeAOT #87064
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Runtime.Tests failing in debug builds on main #83415
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests work item crash with Mono on Linux x64 #87327
  • Keyed services aren't working with HttpClientBuilder #89446
  • [wasm] Make AOT build produce equal binaries on windows and mac #66461
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Update Skiasharp needed that's built with a newer emscripten #82725
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update emsdk to latest #80784
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Review `FROZEN_CACHE` setting in the build targets #83281
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Improved experience when SharedArrayBuffer is not available #76961
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten cache being unwritable due to permissions can cause AOT build to get stuck #75345
    8.0.0
  • Add support for the WASM SIMD APIs #53730
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT EventPipe require a reasonable random number generation to create guids #88789
    8.0.0
  • [AndroidCrypto] Any TargetHost input is set as SNI hostname #79143
  • [wasm] `wasmconsole` build raises `warning CA1416: This call site is reachable on all platforms. 'JSExportAttribute' is only supported on: 'browser'.` #79314
    8.0.0
  • Create the published AppBundle for a WebAssembly Browser App in the publish folder #77222
    8.0.0
  • Access Violation in jithelpers with Dynamic PGO enabled #87597
    8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] DynamicGenerics tests failed on apple mobile platforms #89436
    8.0.0
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource behaves inconsistently for LogAlways #87983
    8.0.0
  • [arm32/arm64] Enable illink testing in CI #9350
    Future
  • [arm32/arm64] Enable IL asm round-trip testing in CI #9352
    Future
  • ICorDebugType.GetStaticFieldValue fails from AV in ReadyToRun_EnclosingTypeMap::GetEnclosingTypeNoThrow #89484
    8.0.0
  • StreamWriter might not call Flush #89480
  • [API Proposal]: Add CloseAsync to Stream #89479
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to work with net8.0, and the updated SDK #75719
    8.0.0
  • AppContext.BasedDirectory can not return a valid file directory info #74750
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator ConvertToLibraryImportAnalyzerTests failing with new function pointer support #71891
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • `IUnknown` is also valid for call to `DllGetClassObject` #89540
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix hits for new analyzer CA1862 #89539
    area-System.Security, code-fixer
  • Flow binder gen location info to facilitate local diag suppression #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Support unloadability in `Microsoft.CSharp`. #89536
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, community-contribution
  • Only register System.Diagnostics section on net7 and later #89535
    area-System.Configuration
  • Gather optimization info through the DAC #89534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #89532
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Remove illink test workaround for removed declaring type #89529
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Remove extraneous quotation marks and other doc fixes #89528
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm][debugger]Trying to improve CI performance for debugger-tests #89525
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove unused suppressions for System.Linq.Expressions #89524
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, source-build
  • Make host tests use HostWriter to create apphost to test #89523
    area-Host
  • Fixing the new V512 logic to properly negate the mask checks #89522
    area-System.Memory
  • Add some checks for merged test groups #89521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle half/quarter accesses for SIMDs in local morph #89520
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ABI and Interop issues with InlineArray types #89519
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure System.Text.Json SG diagnostics don't use Location values from referenced assemblies. #89518
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Update zlib to v1.2.13, intel-zlib to v1.2.13_jtk #89517
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • Tag events with thread specific information #89516
    8.0.0
  • Convert CMakeSettings.json to CMakePresets.json for coreclr #89513
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IKeyedServiceProvider interface on ServiceProviderEngineScope #89509
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][tests] Use RecursiveDir property to create app bundle for Helix #89508
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [Draft] Optimize some Vector usage patterns in morph #89506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][http] test and compatibility improvements #89504
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add CreateParameter() to DbBatchCommand #89503
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enabled Ctor, Set_Item and Get_Item Vector4 intrinsics for miniJIT on ARM64 #89501
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Set method context for delegate GDV #89499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Attempt to enable test #89498
    needs-area-label
  • Remove `AssemblyMetadata(".NETFrameworkAssembly", "")` attributes #89490
    area-Meta
  • Disable networking in XML resolver in AOT compilers #89489
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix a bunch of DWARF errors #89488
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ownership handle to IPC Eventpipe object #89486
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger test failures #89485
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Check for dotnet.dll when enumerating SDK paths #89333
    area-Host
  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors within the CLFS linux #89422
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Improve case-insensitive prefix extraction in Regex #89449
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Improve Http test timeout exception information #89505
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Avoid some rune iteration in GetEncodedTruncatedBytesFromString #89458
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [browser][mt] enable mono_gc_is_critical_method for MT build #88735
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix a couple of replay bugs #89443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IO.Packaging test to check non-unicode value in ZipArchiveEntry general purpose bit flag #88978
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix STJ source gen support for System.BinaryData. #89454
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] MarshalingPInvokeScanner tolerates DLLs without metadata #89430
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP] Catch and ignore exception from an external server #89452
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add test case for RavenDB's AV issue #89493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding test for #42421 #89395
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Do not set -msimd128 in the default rsp #89433
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix outerloop.yml #89497
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Enable skipped networking tests #89232
    area-System.Net, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix issue references in ConvertToLibraryImportAnalyzerTests #89225
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Fix opt-cross-module using non version safe tokens #89481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2230185 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix ProfileEnter / ProfileLeave #88134
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WASM][WIP] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Look for Native Signal SIMD Context #89467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with LLVM + refactoring miniJIT opcodes #89431
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Generate an 'out' local variable for unmanaged to managed stubs when the value needs to be marshalled out to unmanaged #89139
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Ownership tracking #89329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Avoid boxing in Enum.HasFlag in Tier0 #89348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionBuilder attribute to some immutable collection interfaces #89459
    area-System.Collections, blocked, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][interp] Add implicit conversion of floating-point call args #89428
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Setting RequiredMemberAttribute usage as inherited. #89418
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #89388
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.x
  • Make a copy of 'clrjit' binary for use in SuperPMI collect to avoid heap errors when the same 'clrjit' binary is used #89473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `CompressSymbols` opt-out option in NativeAOT #85192
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
